short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension created to help users read faster, improve focus and readability

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension was created to help the users to improve their reading speed, focus and readability for long texts by creating focus points on which the user can place their eyes to maintain concentration and improve their reading experience.

To use it just open the webpage you want to read and click on the extension icon, it will automagically improve the text

To restore the page you can simply reload it
